subject: Recent order
description_text:
Hello
On Wednesday October 1st, I placed an order for a set of pedals online. My
credit card has been charged but I have not received any receipts or
payment confirmation nor any shipment information.

My name and address are:
sebastien katch
465 hillspur rd
Ann Arbor, MI
48105
USA

Can you please look into your systems and promptly
1. send me a receipt and confirmation of the order
2. send me the delivery information

thank you
Sebastien
